Mike Clark wrote:

<snip />

>  > Do you then execute all permutations as one big test?
> 
> Yessir.  The test reads the test data from file, and for each
> permutation makes an assertion.  If the name of the permutation is
> important in debugging failures, then some label is included as a
> column of each permutation row as the message to be displayed.  Nothing
> fancy.  I'm happy to write-up an example if folks are interested.

...and you don't mind that one failing test brings down the whole suite?
--
